statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 1, total_amount = total_amount + (SELECT price FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1001) WHERE product_id = 1001 AND sale_date = '2022-06-15';
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 2, total_amount = total_amount - 2 * (SELECT price FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1002) WHERE product_id = 1002 AND sale_date = '2022-06-21';
